::Hot Rod::

"Sorry, if this is too much pressure on you. I know this is a bit to
take in. But I thought you should know the depth of what we had. And I
still have these feelings for you, yes." He looked her over, and gave
her a kiss on the cheek. He didn't want to go to far, not yet.
"I'll help you recouver the memories, beloved."
